content: different values are in the user definition. The value for STORAGE defines how much main memory the virtual machine gets at log-on time. The value for MAXSTORAGE defines how much memory can be used by issuing define storage. Consider the following examples:  Retrieve information about the current memory setting of LNXADMIN: ===> dirm for LNXADMIN STORAGE ?  Set the default storage size for LNXADMIN to 800 MB: ===> dirm for LNXADMIN STORAGE 800M  Set the maximum storage size for LNXADMIN to 2 GB: ===> dirm for LNXADMIN MAXSTORAGE 2G 11.4.8 Modifying a user Complete the following steps to manually change a profile: 1.
